mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM article WHERE is_private = 0 AND is_draft = 0

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cover, a.brief, c.name AS categoryName, a.tag, a.pageviews, a.author, a.create_time AS createTime FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = a.category_id WHERE a.is_private = 0 AND a.is_draft = 0

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, a.update_time AS updateTime, c.name AS categoryName, a.tag, a.pageviews, a.author, a.create_time AS createTime FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = a.category_id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_private = 0 AND a.is_draft = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE article a SET a.pageviews = a.pageviews + 1 WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_private = 0 AND a.is_draft = 0
